issue.title: [Java] Enhance code style checking for Java code (remove consecutive spaces)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7429](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7429). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This issue is opened in response to a discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5861#discussion_r348917065.

We found the current style checking for Java code is not sufficient. So we want to enhace it in a series of "small" steps, in order to avoid having to change too many files at once. 

In this issue, we remove consecutive spaces between tokens, so that tokens are separated by single spaces.
